settings.title: Order
How do I place an order?
settings.answer: To place an order, simply browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. Follow the prompts to provide your shipping and payment information.

settings.title: Can I modify or cancel my order after it's placed?
settings.answer: We aim to process orders quickly. Please contact our customer support info@ikinita.com as soon as possible to check if modifications or cancellations are still possible.

settings.title: How can I track my order's status?
settings.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your order on our website or the carrier's website.

settings.title: Your order is cancelled by us
settings.answer: Our customer support team will contact you within 24 hours to let you know about the problem that might have occurred and proceed to order or make a reimbursement.

settings.title: Receive the incorrect item
settings.answer: Please contact our customer support info@ikinita.com as soon as possible with the picture of the item you received. We'll exchange it for you.

settings.title: Account
How do I create an account?
settings.answer: Click on "Sign Up" or "Create Account" and follow the instructions. You'll need to provide your name, email address, and create a password. You can also create an account at the time of checkout

settings.title: I forgot my password. What should I do?
settings.answer: On the login page, click "Forgot Password?" Follow the prompts to reset your password. You will receive an email with instructions.

settings.title: How do I update my account information?
settings.answer: Log in to your account and go to the "My Account" or "Profile" section. From there, you can update your personal information, shipping address, and payment details.

settings.title: Shipping
What are the shipping options available?
settings.answer: We offer various shipping options, including standard and express shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times depend on your location and chosen method.

settings.title: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. You can check if we ship to your location during the checkout process.

settings.title: How can I track my package once it's shipped?
settings.answer: You will receive a tracking number via email when your order ships. Use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's site.

settings.title: Returns & Refunds
What is your return policy?
settings.answer: Our return policy allows for returns within 14 days of receiving your order. Items must be in unused condition with tags attached.

settings.title: How do I initiate a return?
settings.answer: Log in to your account, go to the "Order History" section, and select the order containing the item you want to return. Follow the instructions to initiate the return process.

settings.title: When will I receive my refund after a return?
settings.answer: Refunds are typically processed within 14 business days after we receive your returned item. The time it takes to appear in your account may vary based on your payment method.

settings.title: Exchanges
Can I exchange an item for a different size or color?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer exchanges for different sizes or colors. Initiate the exchange process through your account or contact customer support for assistance.

settings.title: Is there a cost associated with item exchanges?
settings.answer: In most cases, you are responsible for the return shipping costs. However, if the exchange is due to a product defect or error on our part, we will cover the shipping costs.

settings.title: How long does it take to process an exchange?
settings.answer: Exchange processing times vary but typically take 14 business days. You will receive an email notification once your exchange is shipped.

settings.title: Warranty & Repairs
What is your warranty policy?
settings.answer: We offer lifetime warranty on our products, which covers manufacturing defects. If you encounter any issues within this period, please contact our customer support for assistance.

settings.title: How do I request a repair under warranty?
settings.answer: To request a repair covered by our warranty, please fill out our warranty claim form on our website, and our support team will guide you through the process.

settings.title: What is not covered by the warranty?
settings.answer: Our warranty does not cover damage caused by misuse, accidents, or unauthorized modifications. Please refer to our warranty policy for more details on exclusions.

settings.title: How long does a typical repair take?
settings.answer: Repair times vary based on the nature of the issue. We aim to complete repairs as quickly as possible, and our customer support team will provide you with an estimated timeline.

settings.title: Payment Methods
What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. You can select your preferred payment option during checkout.

settings.title: Is my payment information secure when making a purchase?
settings.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. We use encryption and secure payment gateways to protect your payment information, ensuring a safe and secure transaction.

settings.title: Can I save my payment information for future purchases?
settings.answer: Yes, you can choose to securely store your payment information in your account for convenience on future orders. Your data will be encrypted and protected.
